name: Hirbel's Protective Skin
description: Forged from the scales of a great wurm's impenetrable hide.
benefit: Benefit. Reduces physical damage by 1 (minimum of 1).

name: Autumn Fire
description: Made to give the wearer the appearance of a fire breathing wurm.
benefit: Benefit. You deal +1d4 fire damage with melee weapons.
additional: Once per day, you can cast Burning Hands with a +4 bonus.

name: Sun-Touched Chainmail of Hyran Rath
description: An armor created to combat creatures suchs as ghouls and vampires.
benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of poison and disease.
additional: Once per day, you can cast Smite with a +4 bonus.

name: Wurmwull
description: Protects the wearer from the slashing claws and fiery breath of a great wurm.
benefit: Benefit. Reduces physical damage by 1 and reduces fire damage by 3 (minimum of 1).

name: Heldrik's Coat
description: Provides additional padding to protect the wearer from the bitter cold.
benefit: Benefit. Reduces cold damage by 3 (minimum of 1).
additional: You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of paralyze.

name: Coat of Ill Payment
description: Attackers will recoil in pain after successfully landing their blows.
benefit: Benefit. Attackers within close range take 1 point of damage when they strike you.

name: Angio's Gambeson
description: Aids in performing jawdropping feats that seem to defy the laws of nature and good sense alike.
benefit: Benefit. Your Dexterity stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).
additional: Once per day, you can cast Misty Step with a +4 bonus.

name: Elryn's Jacket
description: Where most padded armor is constructed in vertical strips, this one bears a distinctive diamond pattern.
benefit: Benefit. Your Wisdom stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).
additional: Once per day, you can cast Blind/Deafen with a +4 bonus.

name: Blaidh Golan
description: Blaidh Golan, or Wolf Heart, is said to have been blessed by Jezelda herself.
benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of paralyze.

name: Rebel's Call
description: Revolutionaries from Galt struck fear into the hear of the Empire of Taldor.
additional: Once per day, you can cast Shield of Faith with a +4 bonus.

name: Hand and Key
benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of charm and confusion.

name: Elardh Dwr
benefit: Benefit. Your Constitution stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).

name: He Carries Many Scars
additional: Once per day, you can cast Regenerate with a +4 bonus.

name: Argwes Adra
benefit: Benefit. Your Intelligence stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).
additional: You have advantage on checks made to stabilize.

name: Raiment of Sivanah's Eyes
additional: Once per day, you can cast Mirros Image with a +4 bonus.

name: Rundl's Finery
benefit: Benefit. Your Intelligence stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).

name: Starlit Garb
benefit: Once per day, you can cast Holy Weapon with a +4 bonus.
additional: Once per day, you can cast Cleansing Weapon with a +4 bonus.

name: Gwisk Gias
benefit: Benefit. Your Constitution stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20).
additional: You have advantage on checks made to stabilize.

benefit: Benefit. Your Dexterity stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 22)

benefit: Benefit. Once per day, you may cause an attack that hits you to miss instead.

benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of paralyze.

benefit: Benefit. Reduces acid and cold damage by 3 (minimum of 1).

benefit: Benefit. Your Wisdom stat is increased by 2 (to a maximum of 20)

benefit: Benefit. Reduces fire damage by 3 (minimum of 1).

benefit: Benefit. You have advantage on attacks rolls against flanked, prone, and stunned enemies.

benefit: Benefit. You heal yourself +1 damage when casting Cure Wounds.
